pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Genms -Smart Brain and the 1000% Crisis- (2022, TTFC special)

Converted from a $(l:zero_one/items/humagear_progrisekey)Humagear Progrisekey$(/l) by getting the Bugster Virus as $(l:zero_one/riders/thouser)Kamen Rider Thouser$(/l) while having the $(l:zero_one/items/ark_one_progrisekey)Ark-One Progrisekey$(/l) in your inventory
